node_info.name: emailReadImap

properties.name: postProcessAction
properties.description: What to do after the email has been received. If "nothing" gets selected it will be processed multiple times.

properties.name: downloadAttachments
properties.description: Whether attachments of emails should be downloaded. Only set if needed as it increases processing.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used

options.name: RAW
options.description: Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used

options.name: Resolved
options.description: Returns the full email with all data resolved and attachments saved as binary data

options.name: Simple
options.description: Returns the full email; do not use if you wish to gather inline attachments

properties.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
properties.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"
